analysis.description:
Random (/unique_chucks/21/0xad7e9b5b9d15f2b26464ecbe76065f033b126a6c.sol#3-319) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0xad7e9b5b9d15f2b26464ecbe76065f033b126a6c.sol#76-84)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/21/0xad7e9b5b9d15f2b26464ecbe76065f033b126a6c.sol#203-207:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
